title: Passwordless Authentication: The Future of Digital Security
author: Michael Rodriguez
excerpt: Major tech giants are finally moving away from traditional passwords. With biometric authentication, passkeys, and hardware security keys
content: Major tech giants are finally moving away from traditional passwords. With biometric authentication, passkeys, and hardware security keys becoming mainstream, the era of complex passwords may be coming to an end. This shift promises not only enhanced security but also improved user experience. Early adopters report a 70% reduction in account breaches.
